---

description: 'How to generate an address for an account.'

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import TipAccountApproaches from '../../_admonitions/_tip-account-approaches.md';

After you have [created an account](./create-account.mdx), you have a single address in the account. This should be
enough for one user using
the [single-account model](../../explanations/accounts-and-addresses.md#single-account-model). However, if you want to use
the [multi-account-account model](../../explanations/accounts-and-addresses.md#multi-account-model), you will need to
generate an address for each user in this account.

<TipAccountApproaches />

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and get Alice's [`Account`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html) which was
   [created in the first guide](./create-account.mdx).
2. Generate an [`AccountAddress`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/types/struct.AccountAddress.html)
   in Alice's account by calling the
   [`Account.generate_ed25519_addresses()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html#method.generate_ed25519_addresses)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/create_address.rs#L44-L46
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and get Alice's [`Account`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html) which was
   [created in the first guide](./create-account.mdx).
2. Generate an [`Address`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Address.md) in Alice's account by calling the
   [`Account.generateEd25519Addresses()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#generateed25519addresses) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/create-address.ts#L31
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and get Alice's [`Account`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.Account.html) which was
   [created in the first guide](./create-account.mdx).
2. Generate an [`Address`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/address.md) in Alice's account by calling the
   [`Account.generate_ed25519_addresses()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/account.md#generate_ed25519_addresses) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/create_address.py#L18
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```plaintext
Generated address: rms1qrjahvcjhfl668vegm8vej48prsdh9n4rwpzr33j60m6vvux5yjhg2w9hq3
```
